message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Considering its high quality and unique features, I propose a price of $200 for it. Please let me know if this works for you or if you'd like to make a counteroffer.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking for something within my budget. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $150 for the product. I hope this meets your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. To find a middle ground, I would like to suggest a counteroffer of $175 for the product. I hope this proposal is more suitable for your needs. Let me know what you think.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to make a counteroffer of $160 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your pricing strategy while staying within my budget.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. In order to reach an agreement, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $165 for the product. This price reflects the value of the product and allows us to move forward. I hope this proposal meets your expectations.
Thank you for your latest offer, Alice. I am willing to consider $162 for the product. I believe this price is fair for both parties and stays within my budget.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I am glad we are making progress. Considering the value of the product and aiming for a mutually beneficial outcome, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $163 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to find a common ground. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $161 for the product. I believe this price respects the value of the product while staying within my budget.

I appreciate your consideration, Bob. To find a satisfactory solution, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $162 for the product. This price reflects the value of the product and aims to meet both our interests. I hope this proposal is agreeable to you.
